title: Folk Music
description: Rooted in regional traditions, folk music tells cultural stories using instruments like guitars and fiddles, showcasing global diversity.

title: Acoustic Music
description: Acoustic music relies on natural sound amplification without electronic instruments. It often features unplugged performances using acoustic guitars, pianos, or other non-amplified instruments, highlighting a raw and authentic sound.

title: Traditional Music
description: Preserving cultural identity, traditional music, passed down through generations, plays a vital role in connecting communities with their heritage.

title: Classical Music
description: A timeless form with intricate compositions and orchestral arrangements, classical music spans centuries and features renowned composers like Mozart and Beethoven.
